H0.text: Famous for its glass manufacturing, what is the real name of Malta’s ‘Silent City’. Valletta

H1.text: Famous for its glass manufacturing, what is the real name of Malta’s ‘Silent City’. Rabat

H2.text: Famous for its glass manufacturing, what is the real name of Malta’s ‘Silent City’. Sliema

H3.text: Famous for its glass manufacturing, what is the real name of Malta’s ‘Silent City’. Mdina

A4.text: The city has never regained the importance it had before 1530, giving rise to the popular nickname the 'Silent City' among both locals and visitors.

A5.text: No cars (other than a limited number of residents, emergency vehicles, wedding cars and horses) are allowed in Mdina, partly why it has earned the nickname 'the Silent City'.
